meanings.definition: A type of grass found in salt marshes.
meanings.sent1: The spartina swayed gently in the salty breeze.
meanings.sent2: Birds often nest in the spartina along the marshes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon tried to hide in the spartina but got stuck.
meanings.sent4: The spartina stood tall like a green army guarding the marsh.
meanings.sent5: The spartina danced gracefully as the tide came in.

meanings.definition: The genus of grasses to which cordgrass belongs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the spartina genus to understand its different species.
meanings.sent2: Cordgrass is a well-known member of the spartina genus.
meanings.sent3: The spartina genus had a family reunion, and all the grasses got along.
meanings.sent4: In the world of grasses, the spartina genus reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: Each spartina in the genus has its own unique characteristics.
